translations: 至高点；天顶；头顶（vertex 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Because one vertex can only have one normal, you must duplicate the vertices as well.
sentences.translation: 由于一个顶点只能有一条法线，所以你还要复制顶点。

sentences.sentence: Imagine a stretchy wrapping paper that you pin to your gift at the vertices.
sentences.translation: 可以这样设想，将一块有弹性的包装纸钉在礼物的各顶点上。

sentences.sentence: To reduce memory, you first separate the vertices from their triangle definitions.
sentences.translation: 为节约内存，首先应将顶点与其三角形定义分隔开来。
